articles.title: Thief Breaks Through Card Shop Wall And Steals $250,000 Worth Of Pokémon Cards - Kotaku
articles.description: The store was robbed in the middle of the night by a man via a small hole in the wall of a next-door shop
articles.content: A locally-owned game and card shop in Forest Lake, Minnesota was robbed by a lone thief in the middle of the night on February 10. The man escaped with $250,000 worth of rare Pokémon cards and cash.… [+2459 chars]
